::: {.callout-note}
This builder runs entirely in your browser. No data leaves your machine.
:::

## 1. Import Project

Upload a REDCap project XML export to detect your surveys.

<div class="mb-3">
  <label for="xml-file" class="form-label">REDCap Project XML</label>
  <input type="file" class="form-control" id="xml-file" accept=".xml">
</div>

<div id="project-info"></div>

## 2. Configuration

<div class="mb-3">
  <label for="form-name" class="form-label">Timing form name</label>
  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="form-name" value="survey_timing" placeholder="Form name for timing fields">
  <div class="form-text">This will be the name of the new instrument containing your timing fields.</div>
</div>

## 3. Select Surveys

<div id="survey-selection">
  <p class="text-muted">Upload a project XML to see available surveys.</p>
</div>

## 4. Download

<div id="download-section" style="display: none;">
  <div id="download-buttons" class="mb-3"></div>

  <p class="text-muted">Import this instrument via <strong>Designer</strong> > <strong>Upload instrument zip file</strong>. After importing, designate it for the events containing your surveys.</p>

  <div id="preview-container"></div>
</div>

<script type="module">
import { init } from './assets/timing-builder.js';
init();
</script>
